text: Antonio Mendoza may refer to: *Antonio Mendoza (sport shooter) (born 1939), Filipino sport shooter *Antonio (Tony) Mendoza (born 1941), Cuban-American photographer *Antonio de Mendoza y Pacheco (1495-1552), first viceroy of New Spain *Antonio Mendoza (artist) (born 1960), artist ==See also== *Antonio Hurtado de Mendoza (1586-1644), Spanish dramatist
title: Antonio Mendoza
